abstract: The mining company said Marius Kloppers would retire this year and be succeeded by Andrew Mackenzie, one of his first hires after becoming chief executive in 2007.
snippet: The mining company said Marius Kloppers would retire this year and be succeeded by Andrew Mackenzie, one of his first hires after becoming chief executive in 2007.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — BHP Billiton said on Tuesday that its chief executive, Marius J. Kloppers, would retire this year after almost two decades at the company.

headline.main: BHP Billiton Chief to Retire; an Insider Will Succeed Him
headline.print_headline: BHP Billiton Chief to Retire; An Insider Will Succeed Him
